page.title: 10COMMUNITY FACILITIES-GOYTRE
page.content: The village is fairly well served with community facilities which include shops,a post office,primary school,garage,church,chapel,recreation ground and public houses.The facilities cater not only for the residents in the village but also for people from a wider area of the Domesday block. Most of the people interviewed were satisfied with the existing shopping facilities. There was a demand for specific shop types such as a chemist and hairdresser but on the whole the level of shopping facilities is good for a settlement of this size. The village is also well located in relation to the sub-regional shopping centres of Cwmbran,Pontypool and Abergavenny which can all be reached by bus from the village.
